title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for tax-favored retirement health savings accounts, and for other purposes.
content: Retiree Health Account Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) establish tax-exempt retirement health arrangements and individual health accounts to assist retirees in paying their medical expenses. (2) make a portion of the tax credit for retirement plan contributions refundable for contributions to retirement health savings accounts. And (3) direct the Secretary of the Treasury to pay refundable credit amounts to retirement health savings accounts.
